arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
وَلَا تَجْعَلْنِيْ فِيْهِ غَرَضًا لِلْبَلايَا وَالْآفَاتِ
translation: In the Name of Allāh, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
O' Allāh send Your blessings on Muhammad and the family of Muhammad.
O Allah: on this day, (please] do not blame me for my slips,
And (please] excuse me on this day for my wrong deeds and flaws;
And do not expose me on this day to misfortunes and calamities;
Out of Your might; O the Might of the Muslims
transliteration: allāhumma ṣalli `alā muḥammadin wa āli muḥammad
walā taj`alnī fīhi gharaḍan lilbalāyā wal-āfāt
